review: It's a fire tv in a stick 10/10
author: jiff67

review: I like my Chromecast better...  for some reason the amazon stick will stutter, lag, and freeze while I'm watching Netflix or HBO go etc... a problem my Chromecast doesn't seem to have. besides, it's loaded with a ton of unnecessary, all (must be paid for) applications.
author: Dale Campbell

review: I'm used to the my ROKU but the Fire TV Stick does the job :)

review: Better than the Roku I have

review: This is a great device. So many shows to choose from, plus endless games, apps, etc. I love it!
author: Nathaniel Dodson

review: Fire TV StickI know its TRUE!  So go ahead and wake me up.  I was just worried about How could I watch TV in any  room I wanted to go into with all the additional power needed.  Well, now I know How and I got it.  FIRE TV STICK  just GREAT, and the movies are SUPERBLY clear.
author: Deanie H.
